description:
Taxable turnover: intra-Community acquisitions

Explanatory notes for the following statistics:
73321 Turnover tax statistics (assessments)

Definition:
Intra-Community acquisition (in accordance with Section 1a
(1) of the Turnover Tax Law) occurs where items are supplied
from the Community territory to the territory of another
Member State. The items must be supplied by an entrepreneur
(no small entrepreneur) through his enterprise for
remuneration to specific acquirers. The acquired supply is
then subject to turnover tax.


© Statistisches Bundesamt, Wiesbaden 2015
name: Taxable turnover: intra-Community acquisitions
